flawed_nl_solution:
In 5 years, Heath will be 16 + 5 = <<16+5=12>>12 years old.
In 5 years, Jude will be 12 / 3 = <<12/3=4>>4 years old.
The difference in their ages is 12 - 4 = <<12-4=8>>8 years.
Today, Jude will be 16 - 8 = <<16-8=8>>8 years old.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
